attributes.action: Coin2 to be accepted by the Bank of England as currency
attributes.additional_details:
Coin2 will be overtaking Bitcoin in value in the coming months and will be the currency of choice for online gaming in the UK and worldwide.

Seeing as there are millions of online gamers based in the UK alone that means that Coin2 is more than likely to become the second largest currency in the UK to the pound.

Due to this I think the Bank of England should be prepared for such a huge change in the monetary system in the UK.

I therefore propose that the Bank of England recognises Coin2 as a currency from this date forward.
